forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 15 to 28 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 18 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day awakens under a blanket of mostly sunny skies, inviting the city to bask in the gentle warmth of a high near sixty. Yet, as the afternoon approaches, expect a soft descent to around fifty-eight, a reminder that this coastal great has a temperament as capricious as the tides. A brisk west-southwest wind dances through the streets, occasionally gusting with a spirited enthusiasm, rustling the leaves and offering fresh air that triumphantly sweeps away the remnants of any lingering fog. 

Tonight, clouds gather in anticipation, ushering in a cozy low around fifty-two. The wind will remain spirited, a constant companion at thirty-three miles per hour at its most whimsical. Clarity reigns over the Golden Gate and the cityscape, suggesting a pleasant window for strolls along the waterfront or perhaps a leisurely bike ride through the Presidio. Both sun and cloud invite a layered wardrobe; a light jacket paired with something breathable for the afternoon sun should keep you comfortable and prepared for the cooler evening breeze. With the time inching towards daybreak, consider a visit to a local café or a stroll in a nearby park. Relish the simple joys of the day as you embrace the ever-shifting beauty of this remarkable city.
